backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the Wingo game backend with user profile management, round tracking, and bet placement, protected by an access control/authorization mixin that restricts operations by role.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two implemented features (Wingo game frontend UI and casino neon visual theme) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-line summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference for the purpose and key details of every component, hook, and style file.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and chart palette.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TSX entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages authentication state, shows a landing screen for guests or the WingoLobby for authenticated users, and conditionally renders the ProfileSetupModal for new users.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header component displaying the Wingo logo, authenticated user's profile name, and the LoginButton with dark glass-morphism styling.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity that clears the React Query cache on logout and handles already-authenticated edge cases, styled with neon green/red variants.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter a player name before accessing the game, with validation and a save profile mutation.
frontend/src/components/WingoGame/BetHis: Displays a scrollable table of the authenticated user's past bets, showing selection, amount, and win/loss result with payout calculations.
frontend/src/components/WingoGame/Bettin: Renders the betting UI allowing authenticated users to select a number or color and place a bet on the current open round, with quick-amount buttons and feedback messages.
frontend/src/components/WingoGame/Countd: Shows a live countdown timer for the current Wingo round, updating every second and applying urgent styling when 10 or fewer seconds remain.
frontend/src/components/WingoGame/Result: A dialog that displays the winning number and color for a completed round along with the player's bet outcomes and net profit/loss.
frontend/src/components/WingoGame/RoundH: Fetches and displays the last 10 resolved Wingo rounds as a row of color-coded badges, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/WingoGame/RoundR: A small visual badge component that renders a single round's winning number and color (red, green, or violet) with matching neon styling.
frontend/src/components/WingoGame/WingoL: Main lobby component for the Wingo game that displays a countdown timer, round history, betting panel, bet history table, and a result modal triggered when the round ID changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a React context hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating game data (current round, round history, bet history, user profile, and placing bets) against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Rajdhani and Orbitron fonts, sets up Tailwind layers, defines CSS custom properties for a dark neon theme, and adds utility classes for neon glows and animated effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for sensitive values like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Wingo game frontend, extending the theme with neon/game color palettes, custom fonts (Orbitron, Rajdhani), neon box shadows, and animation keyframes, while enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state for the Wingo game, including existing frontend features (lobby UI, neon theme), pending new feature requests (backend game logic, new platform), and architectural/image asset requirements.
